game_description: Sense Arena is the #1 Hockey Sense training platform designed by innovative hockey leaders and used by professional players and goalies across the whole world. Experience one-of-a-kind off-ice training that focuses on improving read and react cognitive skills, which are crucial for optimal peak performance. Sense Arena is the official cognitive training partner of the New Jersey Devils and the Arizona Coyotes. "Sense Arenaâ€™s ability to hone skills critical to overall player improvement and peak performance in an off-ice simulation is an edge for players at all levels of our organization." Dr. Chris Stackpole, Vice President, Athlete Care, New Jersey Devils "When I first experienced Sense Arena I immediately knew it's a game-changer. Sense Arena gives motivated goalies the opportunity to improve without the physical wear and tear associated with on-ice training." Brian Daccord, Assistant GM Arizona Coyotes *Paid subscription is required
